text: L6.6. Applying Amdahl's Law Assume that a program spends its time only in ALU operations and Memory operations. You are told that an application spends 9% of its time in the ALU and takes 442 seconds to complete. If we make the memory system 2.5 times faster, how long will it take for the program to complete? number (rtol=0.001, atol=1e-08) seconds @ Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
